meanings.sent1: The plain, unseasoned chicken tasted bland.
meanings.sent2: I prefer my food with some seasoning, not unseasoned like this.
meanings.sent3: He tried to spice up the unseasoned soup by adding salt, but it didn't help.
meanings.sent4: Her unseasoned cooking skills left much to be desired.
meanings.sent5: The unseasoned steak lacked any hint of flavor.

meanings.sent1: The unseasoned intern struggled with the new project.
meanings.sent2: She felt unseasoned in the field of computer programming.
meanings.sent3: The unseasoned hiker got lost on the easy trail.
meanings.sent4: His unseasoned approach to the problem showed his lack of expertise.
meanings.sent5: The unseasoned detective overlooked a crucial clue.
